chat.title: Health Assistant
chat.subtitle: Get health information, lifestyle advice, and guidance on when to see a doctor
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your health assistant. I can help you understand symptoms, provide lifestyle advice, and guide you on when to seek medical attention. How can I help you today?
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.disclaimer: This assistant provides general health information only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

report.title: Health Report Analyzer
report.subtitle: Upload your lab report and get an easy-to-understand explanation of your results.
report.uploadSubtitle: Drag and drop or click to browse
report.supportedFormats: Supports PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP (max 10MB)
report.disclaimerText: This analysis is for educational and informational purposes only. It is NOT a medical diagnosis and should NOT be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Laboratory values can be influenced by many factors, and only a qualified healthcare provider can properly interpret these results in the context of your complete medical history. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding your health. If you have concerns about any values in this report, please consult a healthcare professional promptly.
report.historySubtitle: View and manage your past analyses
report.noReportsSubtitle: You haven't analyzed any health reports yet.
report.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this report?
report.ocrDesc: Automatically reads text from PDFs and images
report.securityDesc: Your data is encrypted and secure
report.speedDesc: Get analysis in under a minute
report.userProfile: Optional: Add Your Profile for Better Analysis
report.userProfileHelp: Providing this information helps us give more relevant suggestions.

seo.defaultTitle: Health Scan | Understand Your Health Reports & Medical Information
seo.defaultDescription: Analyze your health reports easily. Get simple explanations of blood tests, lab reports, and medical documents in English, Hindi, and Spanish.
seo.homeTitle: Health Scan | Your Trusted Health Companion
seo.homeDescription: Get instant health insights, analyze medical reports, and access expert health information. Free blood test analysis and health guidance.
seo.homeKeywords: health analyzer, blood test analyzer, lab report analysis, medical report, health assistant, blood test interpretation, health checkup analysis
seo.reportAnalyzerTitle: Health Report Analyzer - Understand Your Lab Tests
seo.reportAnalyzerDescription: Upload your blood test or lab report and get instant analysis. Understand your health results with simple explanations and lifestyle recommendations.
seo.reportAnalyzerKeywords: blood test analyzer, lab report analysis, health report analyzer, medical test interpretation, CBC analysis, lipid panel analyzer
seo.bloodTestTitle: Free Blood Test Analysis - CBC & Lipid Panel Interpreter
seo.bloodTestDescription: Get your blood test results analyzed. Understand CBC, lipid panels, liver function tests, and more with easy explanations and health recommendations.
seo.bloodTestKeywords: blood test analysis, CBC analyzer, lipid panel interpretation, hemoglobin levels, cholesterol analysis, blood report
seo.cholesterolTitle: Cholesterol Report Analyzer - Understand Your Lipid Panel
seo.cholesterolDescription: Analyze your cholesterol and lipid panel results. Get easy-to-understand explanations of LDL, HDL, triglycerides, and heart health recommendations.
seo.cholesterolKeywords: cholesterol analyzer, lipid panel, LDL HDL analysis, triglycerides interpretation, heart health report, cholesterol test analyzer
seo.blogTitle: Health Blog - Expert Articles on Wellness & Medical Information
